Others: Quentin Grimes set a new career-high in the third quarter, scoring 20 points and contributing to 28 of the Mavericks' 32 third-quarter points.
Brandon Williams, signed to a two-way contract, had a solid performance with 13 points in 20 minutes while finishing as a team-high +8.
Jaden Hardy had 17 points but was a team-worst -19, compared to Brandon Williams.
Spencer Dinwiddie struggled in the game, scoring just two points in 23 minutes with 1/7 shooting, five assists, and three turnovers.
